 2010-09622010-08-04,  ,  ,  HRSDC,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE (EI) REGULATIONS, in order to ensure that the same allowable earnings provisions that are contained in the Employment Insurance Act (EIA) apply to work-sharing claimants.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0175 Publication Date: 2010-08-18
